game_description: you saw an ad about someone needing help fixing their ventilation system. it sounded easy, but this job was much different then then usual work that you were used to. Fix the broken fans by solving puzzles through 5 nights using a unique VR crawling mechanic. Relax at your home and enjoy some TV. This game includes jumpscares.

review_5: And replaced it with gorilla tag movement. The ‚Äúenemies‚Äù are cut up 2d jpegs instead of models, and the game explains nothing about the enemies until you die to them.
